attributes.action: Offer 2017 University NHS Cohort Students at least a % Of the new grant.
attributes.additional_details: This cohort was the first set of students to Have to fund their degree, Yet now you realise it was wrong to do this so it gets changed but when they complete the degree, working long hours while training yet received nothing. Many students worked alongside their degree to survive which meant working over 40+ hours per week most of those unpaid. They not only Graduate into a pandemic but risked their own lives working on the frontline through it. Unable to celebrate their success and graduation canx. the only year to receive nothing and finish with a debt of Nearly 60k.
attributes.background: 2017 cohort in nursing, midwifery and many AHP students (Health Careers) deserve at least a % of the new grant after being the 1st and last health cohort to receive nothing yet graduate into a pandemic after having to fund and work long hours for free.
